metadata.title: CVE-2023-4679 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A use after free vulnerability exists in GPAC version 2.3-DEV-revrelease,specifically in the gf_filterpacket_del function in filter_core/filter.c atline 38. This vulnerability can lead to a double-free condition, which maycause the application to crash.

criterions.comment: gpac package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
